title: Guns and Butter - (Peter Dale Scott) 2010 July 14 [sebaygo1]
description:
.

Guns and Butter
Wednesday, 14 July 2010

[sebaygo1]



"Continuity-of-Government Planning" 

with Peter Dale Scott



The process by which the U.S. Constitution has already been superseded.  FEMA, etc.


[Included with this torrent is a video interview (runtime 12:37) with Peter Dale Scott that was distributed free as an "extra" to the documentary, Invisible Empire, by Prison Planet TV.]
[If you do not want to download this video, simply deselect it in your bit torrent client when setting up to download.]




================================================

"Guns & Butter" investigates the relationships among capitalism, militarism and politics. Maintaining a radical perspective in the aftermath of the September 11th attacks, "Guns & Butter: The Economics of Politics" reports on who wins and who loses when the economic resources of civil society are diverted toward global corporatization, war, and the furtherance of a national security state. <a href="
http://www.kpfa.org/guns-and-butter" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.kpfa.org/guns-and-butter</a>

================================================

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper: 
 Read everything, listen to everything, but believe nothing 
 until you've researched it yourself.
